pullrequest.title: [Blueprint] Service to add performers at runtime

content.raw:
I don't believe even read only operations on `EntityComponentManager` are thread safe. Other threads might be modifying containers holding entities or components or updating views inside the ECM when this thread is calling the accessor function. 

Also, there's a data race on `performerMap` and `performersToAdd`. They are modified/read here and in `CreatePerformerEntity`.
